title: 有向图与无向图研讨会将于2025.6.20-6.27线下举办
content: Symposium on Directed and Undirected Graphs June 20-27 ， 2025 Honorary Chair: Xueliang Li (Nankai University) Gregory Gutin ( Royal Holloway, University of London ) Anders Yeo (University of Southern Denmark) Invited speaker (Names not listed in order): Alexandr V. Kostochka (University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign) Jørgen Bang-Jensen (University of Southern Denmark) Allan Lo (University of Birmingham) Jaroslav Nesetril (Charles University) Bojan Mohar (Simon Fraser University) Maya Stein (University of Chile) Stephan Kreutzer (Technical University Berlin) Raphael Yuster (University of Haifa) Alexey Pokrovskiy (University College London) Fedor Fomin (University of Bergen) Sergey Shpectorov (University of Birmingham) … (Continuously updated!) Organizer: Yongtang Shi (Nankai University) Jiangdong Ai (Nankai University) E-mail: 9920230033@nankai.edu.cn
